titleStmt.title: SII 13.55: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 55. (A.R. No. 98 of 1920.) TIRUMAḺAVĀḌI UDAIYARPALAIYAM TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE RUINED MAṆḌAPA TO THE NORTH OF THE SHRINE OF THE GODDESS IN THE VAIDYANĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an undertaking backed with a security in land, given by two servants of the temple to make an offering of flaked rice to god Gaṇapati in the temple at Punalvāyil on the day of Ārudrā in Mārgaḻi month, with the money endowed for the purpose and left in their charge by a certain Śēndaṉ Vēḷāḷa-Piḷḷaiyār of Kumbaḷḷumbūr in Ōymā-nāḍu, a subdivision of Toṇḍai-nāḍu.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirājakecaripanmaṟkku yāṇṭu 3Āvatu pu
ṉalvāyil śrīkoyil gaṇapati bhaṭṭārarkku candrāditta
val toṇṭaināṭṭu Oymā(ṉ)ṉāṭṭu kumpaḷḷumpūr ce
ntaṉ veḷāṉ piḷḷaiyār gaṇapatiyārkku mārkaḻit ti
ruvātirai nāḷ Aval Amutu ceyya tūṇi nānāḻi Aval
Aṭṭuvatāka koṇṭa poṉ Eḻu mañcāṭiyum kuṉṟi Ivvūr kāma
kkāṇi Aiyāṟaṉ devasvāmiyyum Aiyāṟaṉ mā
devaṉum Iviruvom Ivvava(l)lukku nāṅkaḷ
Oṟṟivaytta nilamāvatu melūr Eṅkaḷ The inscription stops here incomplete.
Digital edition of SII 13.55 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
